verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye this, <S%H2063><s%> O priests; <S%H3548><s%> and hearken, <S%H7181><s%> ye house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and give ye ear, <S%H238><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of the king; <S%H4428><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> is toward you, because <S%H3588><s%> ye have been <S%H1961><s%> a snare <S%H6341><s%> on Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> and a net <S%H7568><s%> spread <S%H6566><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Tabor. <S%H8396><s%>
And the revolters <S%H7846><s%> are profound <S%H6009><s%> to make slaughter, <S%H7819><s%> though I <S%H589><s%> have been a rebuker <S%H4148><s%> of them all. <S%H3605><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> hid <S%H3582><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> me: for <S%H3588><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> O Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> thou committest whoredom, <S%H2181><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> is defiled. <S%H2930><s%>

They will not <S%H3808><s%> frame <S%H5414><s%> their doings <S%H4611><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> their God: <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of whoredoms <S%H2183><s%> is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of them, and they have not <S%H3808><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> doth testify <S%H6030><s%> to his face: <S%H6440><s%> therefore shall Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Ephraim <S%H669><s%> fall <S%H3782><s%> in their iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> shall fall <S%H3782><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> them.

They shall go <S%H1980><s%> with their flocks <S%H6629><s%> and with their herds <S%H1241><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> but they shall not <S%H3808><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> him; he hath withdrawn <S%H2502><s%> himself from <S%H4480><s%> them.

They have dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> against the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they have begotten <S%H3205><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> children: <S%H1121><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> shall a month <S%H2320><s%> devour <S%H398><s%> them with <S%H854><s%> their portions. <S%H2506><s%>

Blow <S%H8628><s%> ye the cornet <S%H7782><s%> in Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> and the trumpet <S%H2689><s%> in Ramah: <S%H7414><s%> cry aloud <S%H7321><s%> at Beth-aven, <S%H1007><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee, O Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> desolate <S%H8047><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of rebuke: <S%H8433><s%> among the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have I made known <S%H3045><s%> that which shall surely be. <S%H539><s%>

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> like them that remove <S%H5253><s%> the bound: <S%H1366><s%> therefore I will pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H5678><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them like water. <S%H4325><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and broken <S%H7533><s%> in judgment, <S%H4941><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he willingly <S%H2974><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the commandment. <S%H6673><s%>
Therefore will I <S%H589><s%> be unto Ephraim <S%H669><s%> as a moth, <S%H6211><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> as rottenness. <S%H7538><s%>

When Ephraim <S%H669><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sickness, <S%H2483><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> saw <S%H853><s%> his wound, <S%H4205><s%> then went <S%H1980><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the Assyrian, <S%H804><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> to <S%H413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> Jareb: <S%H3377><s%> yet could <S%H3201><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> heal <S%H7495><s%> you, nor <S%H3808><s%> cure <S%H1455><s%> <S%H4480><s%> you of your wound. <S%H4205><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will be unto Ephraim <S%H669><s%> as a lion, <S%H7826><s%> and as a young lion <S%H3715><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> I, <S%H589><s%> even I, <S%H589><s%> will tear <S%H2963><s%> and go away; <S%H1980><s%> I will take away, <S%H5375><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> shall rescue <S%H5337><s%> him.

I will go <S%H1980><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> my place, <S%H4725><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> they acknowledge their offense, <S%H816><s%> and seek <S%H1245><s%> my face: <S%H6440><s%> in their affliction <S%H6862><s%> they will seek me early. <S%H7836><s%>
